title: Tokyo Inroaded: Closed Eden - Novel Updates
author: Kyouhei Iwai
description: Two years have passed since the transformation of Tokyo. Highschool student, Akizuki Renji, along with the popular idol, Yumiie Kanata, become, “invaders,” whose job is to invade “Critical Zone: Tokyo.” At the dead city known to be controlled by “the enemies of mankind,” can the sworn promise between Renji and Kanata be fulfilled!?>
